casebody.data:
SUNSET LIGHTERAGE CORPORATION, Appellant, v. Joseph R. FERRY, Appellee. No. 354. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. April 6, 1931. Macklin, Brown, Lenahan & Speer, of New York City (Horace L. Cheyney, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. William F. Purdy, of New York City (John E. Purdy, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before L. HAND, SWAN and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
